column2: J.P. Sears on the Woke Military
column5: J.P. Sears has established himself alongside the Babylon Bee as one of the primary assets in the War against Woke. Here he takes on wokery in the military:  Best line: “Today we’re replacing hand-to-hand combat training with hand-holding training.” Runner up: “Women who can’t lift as much are just as strong as men who can lift more.” The sad part is this might be a documentary rather than satire. Commenters who employ what we deem extreme vulgarity in a comment — “s***” “f***” “a*******” or one of their many variants — will be banned without further notice.  “Arise and take our stand for freedom as in the olden time.”

column1: Winston Churchill “Proclaim Liberty throughout All the land unto All the Inhabitants Thereof.”
